metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1722 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in all ipa versions 4.x.x through 4.8.0. When sending a very long password (>= 1,000,000 characters) to the server, the password hashing process could exhaust memory and CPU leading to a denial of service and the website becoming unresponsive. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: freeipa package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
